question.text: You are having difficulty finding a parking space in a busy town. You can see there is space on the zigzag lines of a zebra crossing. Can you park there?

explanation.text: It’s an offence to park there. You will be causing an obstruction by obscuring the view of both pedestrians and drivers.

answer.text: No, unless you stay with your car
Yes, in order to drop off a passenger
Yes, if you do not block people from crossing
